STXCustomer.Name: STX
STXCustomer.Sql: SELECT Top 1  '{CustomerID}' as CustomerID               , customer.cus_name as CustomerName               , customer.cus_country as Country               , country.country_desc as CountryName               , country.country_territry as Region               , customer.cus_curr_cd as LocalCurrCode               , currency.curr_desc as LocalCurrDesc               , ISNULL(sxlo_loc.lo_udfchar6, 'None') as MBM               , cus_city as City  FROM customer with (nolock)              Left Outer Join sxcu_cust  with (nolock) ON customer.cus_cd = sxcu_cust.cus_cd             Left Outer Join sxcn_cntrct  with (nolock) ON sxcn_cntrct.sxcu_pk=sxcu_cust.sxcu_pk             Left Outer Join sxlo_loc  with (nolock) ON sxlo_loc.sxcn_pk=sxcn_cntrct.sxcn_pk           , country with (nolock)           , currency with (nolock)  WHERE customer.cus_country = country.country_cd        AND customer.cus_curr_cd = currency.curr_cd        AND customer.cus_cd = '{CustomerID}'        AND sxcu_cust.s2_location='STX-AR-MST'

STXCurrency.Name: STX
STXCurrency.Sql: SELECT curr_desc as CurrCodeDescription  FROM currency with (nolock)   WHERE curr_cd = '{QuoteCurrCode}'
